definitions.definition: An exhilarating psychological state of pride and optimism .
A feeling of joy and pride .
A collineation that fixes all points on a line (called its axis) and all lines though a point on the axis (called its center).

main_definition: An exhilarating psychological state of pride and optimism .
secondary_definitions: A feeling of joy and pride .
( geometry ) A collineation that fixes all points on a line (called its axis) and all lines though a point on the axis (called its center).
